long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Panda Data Recovery is a data recovery and file repair software trusted by users all over the world. It is suitable for computer browser web page recovery, computer deleted file recovery, computer formatted recovery, hard disk formatted recovery, computer Recycle Bin emptied recovery, USB disk file deleted recovery, USB disk formatted recovery, SD card deleted file recovery, SD card formatted recovery, document damage repair, video damage repair, picture damage repair, etc. It supports the recovery of more than 1,000 file types, such as: deleted document recovery, deleted picture recovery, deleted video recovery, etc. Free scanning and preview of lost and damaged files, powerful and 100% safe.

Web page recovery
• Restore the web page before the browser crashed due to accidental browser closing.

File deletion recovery
• Recover deleted or corrupted files from computer desktop
• Recover deleted or corrupted files from local disk
• Recover deleted or corrupted files from computer hard disk
• Recover deleted or corrupted files from mobile hard disk
• Recover deleted or corrupted files from USB flash drive
• Recover deleted or corrupted files from SD card

Recover from empty recycle bin
• Recover documents emptied from recycle bin
• Recover videos emptied from recycle bin
• Recover pictures emptied from recycle bin
• Recover audio emptied from recycle bin
• Recover compressed files emptied from recycle bin
• Recover emails emptied from recycle bin
• Recover other types of files emptied from recycle bin

Device format recovery
• Recover files lost due to hard disk formatting
• Recover files lost due to mobile hard disk formatting
• Recover files lost due to mobile computer disk formatting
• Recover files lost due to USB flash drive formatting
• Recover files lost due to SD card formatting

Quick deletion recovery
• Recover files quickly deleted due to accidentally pressing Shift+Del

Partition loss recovery
• When a partition is lost, all the stored data will become inaccessible, recover files from that partition

File recovery from crashed computer

Recover files from a system that cannot be opened due to a computer crash

Repair damaged documents

Repair documents that cannot be opened

Repair damaged pictures & photos

Repair damaged videos

Repair unplayable videos

Repair damaged audio

Repair unplayable audio

4 steps to recover lost data:

•Step 1: Select the location where the data was lost

Select the location where the data was permanently deleted or lost.

•Step 2: Scan your computer or device

Scan the selected location to search for lost files, use filters during the scanning process to easily find files.

•Step 3: Preview lost data
Supports preview while scanning, no limit on the size and number of preview files.

•Step 4: Recover lost data
Select the files you need to recover and click "Recover" to get everything you need.

Why choose Panda Data Recovery software for recovery:

•98% successful recovery rate
Panda Data Recovery is one of the best data recovery tools, supporting multiple data loss scenarios, with a recovery success rate of up to 98% in all data loss situations.

• Unlimited preview
Preview lost files for free, without size or quantity restrictions.

• Convenient file filtering function
Provides you with the most convenient file filtering function, which can filter files according to file type, size, modification time, etc.

• Stable performance
No need to worry about system crashes during scanning or recovery, Panda Data Recovery's stability has always been at the industry leading level.
